titles.title: Fairness for State and Local Workers Act
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for coverage under that Act of employees of States and political subdivisions of States, and for other purposes.
Fairness for State and Local Workers Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Fairness for State and Local Workers Act - Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for coverage under that Act of State and local government workers.
